thread.title: The Last Word, October 2015 | Meridian
thread.title_full: The Last Word, October 2015 | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: The Last Word, October 2015 | Meridian
text:
Play video Lively political debate for the south and south east. Taking part Nusrat Ghani MP (Conservative), Layla Moran (Lib Dem) and Baroness Maggie Jones from Brighton (Lab).
This week: the EU referendum. A new airport for the south east - but where? The first new grammar school - or "annexe" - for fifty years; and the state of the parties after the conferences.
Last updated Thu 15 Oct 2015 Politics Essex Buckinghamshire Berkshire Dorset Sussex Kent Wiltshire Oxfordshire Surrey Hampshire & Isle of Wight
